lead_paragraph: Jason McCartney of the United States won the 14th stage of the Vuelta a España yesterday, and Denis Menchov, who rides for Rabobank, maintained the overall lead for the fifth consecutive leg. McCartney, who rides for the Discovery Channel, finished the 128.6-mile leg in 5 hours 21 minutes 21 seconds.
